attributes.action: immediately overrule Lord Hutton's ludicrous and incriminating decision to keep documents relating to the death of Dr David Kelly closed for 70 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This makes it plainly obvious to anybody with eyes that Lord Hutton was a government stooge put in place to conclude his enquiry favourably for the government of the day.  If the current government has any probity AT ALL it will release the documents NOW so that they may be seen before the conclusion of the current Iraq inquiry.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
